tns:patch.author: apicca
tns:patch.description: Remove ampModule visibility for Second Reporting Organisation

script.lang:
DELETE FROM amp_modules_templates WHERE MODULE IN (SELECT id FROM amp_modules_visibility WHERE upper(name) LIKE upper('/Activity Form/Components/Component/Components % Table/Second Reporting Organisation') );
DELETE FROM amp_modules_visibility WHERE upper(name) LIKE upper('/Activity Form/Components/Component/Components % Table/Second Reporting Organisation');
